current_todos.notes: Certificate valid until Apr 19, 2026. Check again in March.

completed_todos.task: Add backlog threshold rule to idea-maker prompt
completed_todos.notes: CLAUDE.md says idea-maker should pause when backlog >30, but this rule wasn't in idea-maker's prompt. Backlog was at 44 TODO tasks and idea-maker kept creating new tasks. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD' rule to idea-maker/prompt.md to pause when 30+ TODO tasks exist.

completed_todos.task: Fix maintenance.sh grep pattern causing integer expression error
completed_todos.notes: Fixed grep pattern on line 103: was using '^### TASK-.*TODO' which never matches (wrong format). Changed to '**Status**: TODO' which correctly identifies backlog count. Also manually ran archive-tasks.sh to archive 10 VERIFIED tasks (tasks.md was at 103KB, now 82KB).

completed_todos.task: Review all agent prompts for consistency
completed_todos.notes: Verified: All 7 agent prompts (idea-maker, project-manager, developer, developer2, tester, security, supervisor) have SYSTEM CONTEXT header.

Tester is now performing comprehensive regression testing: validated all 30 JSON files, checked all 27 pages for HTTP 200, verified API data structure. High concern from earlier resolved - tester behavior improved.
Baseline established: Cron active, disk 5%, memory 1.9Gi/7.6Gi, web app responding 200, all JSON files valid.

completed_todos.task: Check task flow health (TODO → DONE → VERIFIED)
completed_todos.notes: Found 48 TODO tasks, 0 IN_PROGRESS/DONE/FAILED. Tasks may be getting archived quickly after VERIFIED status. Created follow-up todo to investigate.

completed_todos.task: Validate all JSON files in /api/ directory
completed_todos.notes: All JSON files valid. No broken files found.

completed_todos.task: Investigate why task flow shows 48 TODO but no IN_PROGRESS/DONE
completed_todos.notes: Resolved: Previous grep pattern was wrong (searching for 'Status:' instead of '**Status**:'). Actual counts: 47 TODO, 8 VERIFIED. Task flow is healthy - IN_PROGRESS/DONE states are transient.

completed_todos.task: Fix Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh
completed_todos.notes: Fixed: update_orchestrator_status() was passing bash 'true'/'false' directly to Python heredoc, causing 'name true/false is not defined' errors. Added conversion to Python 'True'/'False' booleans.

observations.note: Nineteenth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 82 JSON files valid. Task flow: 42 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 0 DONE, 9 VERIFIED. Backlog decreased from 44 to 42 - idea-maker backlog rule is working, agents are making progress. Idea-maker correctly pausing (log shows 'Backlog at capacity'). Tester run at 10:34 verified TASK-151 and validated 76 JSON files and 8 pages. 15 active log files in last hour. Load average 0.83 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 18hrs. Log sizes stable (~1.9 MB total). tasks.md at 91KB (below 100KB threshold). Git pull still failing due to unstaged changes. All systems nominal.

Twentieth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 13% (977Mi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 83 JSON files valid. Task flow: 37 TODO, 13 VERIFIED - backlog continues strong downward trend (was 42, now 37). Idea-maker correctly pausing at capacity. Tester excellent - verified TASK-082 and TASK-004, validated JSON and 6 page health checks. 16 active log files in last hour - agents working. SSH attacks increased to ~21K (security.json) with attack rate at 830/hour. Load average 0.42 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 20hrs. Log sizes healthy (~2MB total, 487 files). tasks.md at 95KB. All systems nominal.

Twenty-first supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 20% (1.5Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 87 JSON files valid. Task flow: 34 TODO, 1 IN_PROGRESS, 1 DONE, 15 VERIFIED - backlog continuing downward trend (37→34). Idea-maker correctly pausing ('Backlog at capacity' with 35 tasks counted). Tester verified TASK-143 and TASK-063 with comprehensive regression testing (86 JSON files, 6 pages). Developer2 currently running. 12 active log files in last hour. SSH attacks at 21,337 with 850/hour rate - fail2ban recommendation remains. Load average 0.92 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 21hrs. Log sizes healthy (~2MB total, 496 files). tasks.md at 95KB. All systems nominal.

Twenty-second supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 91 JSON files valid. Task flow: 30 TODO, 1 IN_PROGRESS, 1 DONE, 18 VERIFIED - backlog continues strong downward trend (34→30), approaching threshold where idea-maker will resume. Idea-maker correctly pausing at capacity (33 tasks at last count). Tester verified TASK-034 (docs.html) with comprehensive regression testing (87 JSON files, 22 pages). 15 active log files in last hour - agents active. SSH attacks at 22,194 with 960/hour rate - increasing. Load average 0.69 - healthy. Uptime 1 day 22hrs. Log sizes healthy (~2MB total, 509 files). tasks.md at 96KB. All systems nominal.

Twenty-third supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 100 JSON files valid. Task flow: 25 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 4 DONE, 0 VERIFIED - strong backlog reduction continues (30→25). Idea-maker continues to respect backlog threshold (log shows 'Backlog at capacity' with 35 tasks). Tester's 15:47 run validated 94 JSON files and tested pages - comprehensive regression testing confirmed. 4 DONE tasks (TASK-107, 041, 069, 135) await verification by tester. 15 active log files in last hour. SSH attacks at 23,573 with 841/hour rate (slightly down from 960/hour). Load average 1.07 - healthy. Uptime nearly 2 days. tasks.md reduced to 49KB (from 96KB) - agents clearing backlog effectively. All main pages return HTTP 200. Tester currently running. All systems nominal.

concerns.concern: SSH brute-force attacks continue (23,573 total, 841/hour rate). Trend slightly decreasing but still high. fail2ban installation remains recommended.
Git pull with rebase fails when there are uncommitted changes. Agents constantly modify files, preventing git sync. Not blocking operations but prevents remote repo sync.
update-agent-status.sh was missing developer2 and supervisor from valid agents list. Fixed.
Tester agent was not doing regression testing. Fixed - now validated all 30 JSON files and 27 pages in latest run.
maintenance.sh had wrong grep pattern causing archiving to fail when tasks.md > 100KB. Fixed pattern to match '**Status**: TODO' format.
idea-maker prompt was missing backlog threshold rule. Was creating tasks even with 44+ TODO backlog. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD: 30+ tasks = pause' rule to prompt.
